slogan: A freelance Data Analyst specializing in Power BI & Excel. I help businesses transform messy data into clear dashboards and actionable insights. Whether it's data cleaning, visualization, or KPI tracking, I make sure decision-makers get the clarity they need to act with confidence.
about_desc1: After graduating with a degree in Management Information Systems, my curiosity led me to explore computer networks and how data moves across systems.
about_desc2: During that time, I worked in different roles — from customer service to content management — at international companies serving multiple markets.
about_desc3: While working closely with managers, I was fascinated by how they constantly refined KPIs and transformed massive amounts of raw data into simple, clear dashboards that supported better decisions.
about_desc4: That was the moment I realized my real passion lies in data analysis, organization, and visualization.
about_desc5: Today, I hold a certification in Data Analysis with Power BI and Excel through the Digital Egypt Pioneers Initiative, and I'm excited to keep growing in this field and help businesses make smarter, data-driven decisions.
work1_desc: Turn raw numbers into clear dashboards that highlight trends and opportunities.
work2_desc: Automate recurring reports with Power BI and Excel to focus on what really matters.
work3_desc: Organize messy data into structured insights that drive business growth.
work4_desc: Build KPI dashboards that help you monitor performance at a glance.
project1_desc: Comprehensive Power BI dashboard analyzing sales performance across regions, payment methods, and product categories with interactive visualizations.
project2_desc: Advanced Excel analysis identifying top customers by purchasing behavior, with dynamic pivot tables and interactive charts.
project3_desc: Comprehensive data cleaning and transformation project using Power Query to standardize and prepare raw datasets for analysis.
contact_subtitle: Ready to start your project? Get in touch today
footer_about_desc: Your data has a story, I help it speak!
newsletter_desc: Subscribe to our newsletter for the latest articles and updates in the world of data analysis.
